DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine the effect of a supervised home-based physical fitness program on the aerobic capacity, quality of gait and health related quality of life in people with chronic ischemic stroke. Secondly, feasibility of the program for implementing a long term lifestyle change will be investigated.
DOC.brief_title: SunRISe Study - Stroke Rehabilitation In Suriname
